name: Fall in Love
description:
_______________________________________________________________________________________________

Fall in Love

In Fall in Love, play a squirrel who collects nuts for its loved one!

Run, jump, climb and swim through the levels, but watch out for the spikes and snakes!

_______________________________________________________________________________________________

Controls

- Run: A/D or Left/Right arrow keys

- Jump: Spacebar

- Climb & Swim : W/S or Up/Down arrow keys

_______________________________________________________________________________________________

Music

Music Composed by: paper aviator (Kris Zaballero)

paperaviatormusic.com

https://paperaviator.bandcamp.com/releases
